issue.title: [C++] Make default for ARROW_HDFS to be OFF
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6608](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6608). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is one optional usage of `boost::filesystem` that could be eliminated from the simple "core" build

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6608?focusedCommentId=17013082) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This was done already in another patch, apparently.

```Java

  define_option(ARROW_HDFS "Build the Arrow HDFS bridge" OFF)
```
